fields.summary: Parse Sprint metrics when aggregating Jira data

comments.body:
Need to fix a few bugs:

* status category is wrong because status names are not unique across projects
 → use status_id instead
* we need to ignore subtasks (maybe epics?)
* what to do with “issues completed outside of this sprint”?
jira shows them in a separate section → should we treat them as creep or as planned issues?

(to verify with [~accountid:5fa97a01d74f69007560babf])
